messages.message: Having an error when I try to query this document (74 pages) in converse on UAT.  I used this exact demo with these exact prompts on Monday and now it is failing
@Matt Macnak Can you recreate this conversation by uploading the file again?
whats the max time a multipage doc can sit in converse before it needs to be reloaded?
It's not related to UI reload. This could be due to the indexing storage switch, I will confirm this.
sounds good so does that mean the index got deleted & if it did, does that happen on a recurring basis?
We do not expect this to happen frequently! But there will be some unavoidable scenarios. We are also looking into some automated way of reindexing, still not scoped.
gotcha, is there anyway to determine if this has happened (other than getting this error)?
@Hari we need to prioritize the re-indexing work, let’s chat early next week on this. We can’t change indexing strategy again until we implement this
